entry.title: New release for slskd: 0.22.0
entry.content:
ðŸŽ‰ User-Defined Integrations

User-defined integrations allow users to configure external applications to receive data from slskd as things happen internally. slskd uses an internal event bus over which event data is sent from application logic to whatever destination(s) users choose.

Webhooks

Webhooks (outbound HTTP requests) can be configured to be called when application events are raised. Webhooks are given a name (useful for troubleshooting!), a list of triggering events, a call configuration that defines the HTTP request to be made, and timeout and retry configuration.

Webhook HTTP requests are always a POST, and will always include the event data in the body, serialized as JSON. Users define a fully-qualified endpoint address, an optional collection of headers, and an optional flag to ignore HTTPS errors caused by invalid (e.g. self signed) certificates.

If unconfigured, the default timeout for requests is 5 seconds, and each request will be attempted only once per event.

YAML

yaml integration: webhooks: my_basic_webhook_using_defaults: on: - All call: url: http://localhost:4224 my_webhook_using_detailed_config: on: - DownloadFileComplete call: url: https://192.168.1.42:8080/slskd_webhook headers: - name: X-API-Key # if using API key style authentication value: foobar1234 - name: Authorization # if using JWT authentication value: Bearer eyJ...ssw5c - name: User-Agent # can be useful! value: slskd/0.0 ignore_certificate_errors: true # defaults to false timeout: 5000 # in milliseconds retry: attempts: 3

Scripts

User-defined scripts can be configured to run when application events are raised. Scripts are given a name (useful for troubleshooting!), a list of triggering events, and a run command that's used to execute the script.

The run command must be at least one word, with the first word identifying the executable to run and the rest of the string being the command and arguments that will be passed to the executable when the script is run. The executable needs to be on the system's PATH, otherwise it must be the fully qualified path to the file on disk.

A reserved placeholder value $DATA is replaced with the stringified JSON data associated with the event that caused the script to run. It's the responsibility of the script to parse and handle this JSON.

YAML

yaml integration: scripts: my_post_download_script: on: - DownloadFileComplete - DownloadDirectoryComplete run: /bin/sh data/my_script.sh --json-to-process "$DATA" # Linux/macOS my_logging_script: on: - All run: cmd.exe echo $DATA >> event_log.txt # Windows

What's Changed

Features

  • Add 'Events' by @jpdillingham in https://github.com/slskd/slskd/pull/1215
  • Add the ability to run user-defined scripts when application events are raised by @jpdillingham in https://github.com/slskd/slskd/pull/1232
  • Add the ability to call HTTP endpoints (webhooks) when application events are raised by @jpdillingham in https://github.com/slskd/slskd/pull/1238
  • Add 'noop' event type (no operation, useful for testing) by @jpdillingham in https://github.com/slskd/slskd/pull/1240
  • Add an endpoint to allow raising of events (for testing purposes) by @jpdillingham in https://github.com/slskd/slskd/pull/1247

Enhancements and Bug Fixes

  • Assume remote filenames use a backslash, unless forward slashes are present by @jpdillingham in https://github.com/slskd/slskd/pull/1216
  • use DOTNET_ var in docker by @kasperk81 in https://github.com/slskd/slskd/pull/1219
  • Set request limit for share upload to 10gb by @jpdillingham in https://github.com/slskd/slskd/pull/1229
  • Resolve some build warnings, run linting and fix a bunch of whitespace by @jpdillingham in https://github.com/slskd/slskd/pull/1233
  • Log search logs at the 'Debug' level by @jpdillingham in https://github.com/slskd/slskd/pull/1235
  • Tweak ASP.NET setup, add metadata to Swagger/OpenAPI by @jpdillingham in https://github.com/slskd/slskd/pull/1244
  • Include Content-Type header when returning Prometheus metrics via /metrics by @jpdillingham in https://github.com/slskd/slskd/pull/1245

Documentation

  • Fix search filter config docs by @nhawke in https://github.com/slskd/slskd/pull/1224
  • Fix a copy/paste mistake in search filter documentation by @jpdillingham in https://github.com/slskd/slskd/pull/1236
  • docs: fix YAML indentation by @ppom0 in https://github.com/slskd/slskd/pull/1242
  • Add missing listen_ip_address example by @jpdillingham in https://github.com/slskd/slskd/pull/1246
  • Update reverse_proxy.md by @lemonade-soda in https://github.com/slskd/slskd/pull/1249

Dependencies

  • Bump action-gh-release to v2 by @jpdillingham in https://github.com/slskd/slskd/pull/1214
  • Bump rollup from 2.79.1 to 2.79.2 in /src/web by @dependabot in https://github.com/slskd/slskd/pull/1221
  • Bump cookie and express in /src/web by @dependabot in https://github.com/slskd/slskd/pull/1234

New Contributors

  • @kasperk81 made their first contribution in https://github.com/slskd/slskd/pull/1219
  • @ppom0 made their first contribution in https://github.com/slskd/slskd/pull/1242
  • @lemonade-soda made their first contribution in https://github.com/slskd/slskd/pull/1249

entry.title: New release for slskd: 0.22.3
entry.content:
ðŸ“¢ New Features

@dkschruteBeets added the ability to configure profile pictures! Configure one by specifying the file path in --slsk-picture, by setting SLSKD_SLSK_PICTURE, or by setting the YAML key soulseek.picture.

@samhatter added a right-click context menu to rooms:

User-defined scripts were refactored, including some breaking changes. The major (22) version wasn't bumped for these changes because the previous implementation of scripts was broken. Additionally, jq is now available inside of the slskd container to help with scripts, thanks to @onedr0p.

Lastly, some improvements to the way searches are stored in the database should provide some relief to users who are experiencing 'stuck' searches when using external apps for automation. Included with these improvements is a queuing mechanism that caps the number of concurrent searches at 10, enqueuing subsequent searches. This will help with resource contention and should provide some protection against server bans should automation go awry.

What's Changed

  • Fix log retention to be days in docs by @SpyrosRoum in https://github.com/slskd/slskd/pull/1290
  • Refactor user-defined scripts by @jpdillingham in https://github.com/slskd/slskd/pull/1292
  • Bump serialize-javascript from 6.0.1 to 6.0.2 in /src/web by @dependabot in https://github.com/slskd/slskd/pull/1299
  • feat(container): Add jq by @onedr0p in https://github.com/slskd/slskd/pull/1277
  • Fix search retention example by @jpdillingham in https://github.com/slskd/slskd/pull/1307
  • Adding context menu to rooms with reply, view user profile, and browse shares by @samhatter in https://github.com/slskd/slskd/pull/1298
  • Refactor search logic to help prevent 'hanging' records by @jpdillingham in https://github.com/slskd/slskd/pull/1310
  • Feature/add profile picture support by @dkschruteBeets in https://github.com/slskd/slskd/pull/1303
  • Add the ability to set a profile picture by @jpdillingham in https://github.com/slskd/slskd/pull/1321
  • Remove erroneous mention of --generate-api-key by @jpdillingham in https://github.com/slskd/slskd/pull/1322

New Contributors

  • @SpyrosRoum made their first contribution in https://github.com/slskd/slskd/pull/1290
  • @dkschruteBeets made their first contribution in https://github.com/slskd/slskd/pull/1303

Full Changelog: https://github.com/slskd/slskd/compare/0.22.2...0.22.3
